name: Super Flint Go: Jungle Journey
description:
Super Flint Go - Jungle Adventure 2022 - one of the fun classic adventure games will strike you with the addictive journey and the classic feeling as other adventure and platformer games.

What is the mission of this adventure? Defeat the evil mushroom monsters, save the villagers or rescue the Princess? You have to experience it by yourself!!

Why Flint Go?
+ Beautiful High-resolution Graphics
+ Attractive Music and Sound Effects
+ Classic Four-Button Control like other Platformer games
+ Various levels and maps (jungle, cave, underwater,...) to explore
+ Hidden bonus maps with lots of high value rewards
+ Stores that sell support items
+ FREE for ALL - No paid needed
+ Suitable for kids & all ages

How to play:
+ Use buttons to jump, move, and fire
+ 2 Levels of Jumping: Single-tap on jump button for a low jump, double-tap or hold for a extremely high jump
+ Eat Shield to be protected for a certain amount of time
+ Collect Heart to have more lives

Tips:
+ Kill enemies by jumping or shooting fire
+ Collect coins and bonus items to buy additional items

Are you ready to start this adventure with Super Flint? In the end of the adventure, there will be diamonds, crystals, or Princess! Who knows? Let's start and we will see!
